page.title: 10Kettlesing - Conservation
page.content: Conservation of the traditional landscape and life style of the area seems to be an important issue to many inhabitants of the block, and was given as an important factor in their choice of residence. Issues such as consolidation of farms into larger units, unaesthetic renovation work, low-flying military aircraft (noise pollution), preservation of tradition- al amenities such as the local primary school, all cause intense interest. Recently, a proposed nuclear survival centre attracted intense local concern, with a well-attended public meeting voicing strong opposition mainly on conservation grounds.
